mapper.select: SELECT * from PUREWATEREVERYDAYDATA where TYPE = #{TYPE} and DATADATE = #{DATADATE}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PUREWATEREVERYDAYDATA (TOTALNUM, TYPE, DATADATE, CREATEDATE) VALUES (#{TOTALNUM},#{TYPE},#{DATADATE},sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE PUREWATEREVERYDAYDATA SET TOTALNUM = #{TOTALNUM} , CREATEDATE = sysdate WHERE TYPE = #{TYPE} and DATADATE = #{DATADATE}
mapper.select: SELECT sum(TOTALNUM) as totalNum, TO_CHAR(DATADATE,'mm/dd') as dataDate FROM PUREWATEREVERYDAYDATA WHERE TO_CHAR(DATADATE,'mm/dd')=TO_CHAR(sysdate,'dd') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(DATADATE,'mm/dd')
SELECT sum(TOTALNUM) as totalNum, TO_CHAR(DATADATE,'MM')||'月' as dataDate FROM PUREWATEREVERYDAYDATA WHERE TO_CHAR(DATADATE,'mm')=TO_CHAR(sysdate,'mm') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(DATADATE,'MM')||'月'
